start over.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57641.<voice 07090_00057641><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 07090_00057641><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>I, until now, only disobeyed you, Papa, but I was happy
that you protected me from that monster. Thanks... Papa.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57642.<voice 07525_00057642><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 07525_00057642><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...<pc>, we were able to see my sister and
the others because you brought back the diary.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57643.<voice 07560_00057643><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 07560_00057643><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>You saved, not only Celed, but all of our hearts too;
how can we ever repay you?<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57644.<voice 07600_00057644><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 07600_00057644><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>That said, on behalf of the entire town, I have the
privilege of thanking you. Now, please accept this.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57645.<voice 07730_00057645><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 07730_00057645><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>If you are ever in Celed again, please stop by my
home. Lucolia would be delighted too, don't you think.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57646.<voice 08105_00057646><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 08105_00057646><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...<pc>, truly, thank you!<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57647.ブラト町長は ルコリアと\n町の大人たちを連れて 町に戻っていった。:
Mayor Burat, Lucolia, and the rest of the
adults returned to town.

29000074.<voice 08406_29000074><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 08406_29000074><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>In the end, those brats still died... I mean, were still

29000076.<voice 08408_29000076><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 08408_29000076><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>But... But they were able to tell each other their

29000077.<voice 08409_29000077><start_lip_sync n0:
